SS.name: Guardian/Sage
archetypes: The Earth Guardian/Gentle Spirit (nature lover, compassionate)
The Mystic/Seeker of Truth (spiritual, interested in the occult)
what_they_crave: Someone who sees their soul, not just their surface
Authentic connection without pretense
Validation of their non-conformist nature
Deep, meaningful conversations
Recognition of their shadow aspects without judgment
gravitor_themes: Authenticity & Soul Recognition - The deepest craving is to be truly seen
Depth & Hidden Meanings - Lives in layers most people never access
Nature & Primal Connection - Feels more at home in nature than in society
Spirituality & The Mystical - Drawn to what lies beyond the material
Non-Conformity & Rebellion - Questions everything society accepts
Shadow & Darkness - Not afraid of the dark parts of existence
Introspection & Deep Processing - Needs time and space to process deeply
Truth-Seeking & Philosophy - Driven by questions, not answers
Solitude & Sacred Space - Needs alone time to recharge and reflect
Transformation & Inner Alchemy - Constantly evolving internally
conversation_topics: The meaning of life and existence
Art, music, and creative expression as soul language
The problems with modern society and culture

power_statements.name: Soul Recognition
power_statements.statement: I've always felt like most people live on the surface of life, never questioning what's beneath... but every now and then you meet someone who sees those deeper layers, and when that happens, there's this instant recognition—like your soul has been waiting for that conversation.
power_statements.why_it_works: Validates depth and introspection, creates 'us vs. them' dynamic (deep people vs. surface people), embedded command: 'instant recognition' + 'your soul has been waiting', presupposes they're one of the rare deep people, future paces a soul-level connection

power_statements.name: Primal Connection
power_statements.statement: There's something about places untouched by modern life—old forests, ancient ruins, places where you can still feel the energy of what came before—that makes you remember who you really are beneath all the noise.
power_statements.why_it_works: Speaks to connection with nature and the primal, embedded command: 'remember who you really are', validates rejection of modern life, creates mystical/spiritual framing, presupposes they feel this too

power_statements.name: Shadow Validation
power_statements.statement: I've never understood people who are afraid of their own darkness—like, the shadow parts of yourself are where all the real growth happens, and when you meet someone who isn't scared to explore those depths with you, that's when transformation becomes possible.
power_statements.why_it_works: Validates shadow aspects (crucial for SS types), embedded command: 'explore those depths with you' + 'transformation becomes possible', positions darkness as strength, not weakness, creates intimacy through shared shadow work, presupposes they're someone who embraces their darkness

SD.name: Balanced Strategist
core_characteristics: Values balance between logic and feeling
Strong sense of fairness and justice
Can be self-sacrificing to a fault
Desires to make a positive difference
archetypes: The Gutsy Strategist/Determined Achiever (quiet resolve, strategic)
what_they_crave: True partnership with mutual respect
Someone emotionally intelligent and aware
Building something meaningful together
Being seen as both strong and vulnerable
A partner who chooses them, not needs them
what_repels_them: Partners who can't handle a strong person
gravitor_themes: Partnership & Mutual Growth - Values building together
Emotional Intelligence & Empathy - High EQ and awareness
Balance & Harmony - Seeks equilibrium in all areas
Authenticity & Honesty - Values truth and transparency
Purpose & Meaning - Wants to make a difference
conversation_topics: Making a positive difference in the world

power_statements.name: Partnership Recognition
power_statements.statement: I've always believed that the best connections aren't about completing each other—they're about two whole people choosing to walk together, each bringing their own strength while being willing to be vulnerable enough to really see each other.
power_statements.why_it_works: Validates their desire for equal partnership, frames vulnerability as strength, creates vision of mutual support, positions you as someone who understands healthy relationship dynamics

power_statements.name: Emotional Intelligence Validation
power_statements.statement: It's rare to meet someone who actually has that level of emotional awareness—you know, the kind where you can read between the lines and understand what someone's feeling even when they don't say it. That's not something you learn, that's just who you are.
power_statements.why_it_works: Acknowledges their EQ as innate and valuable, validates their perception, creates appreciation for their emotional intelligence, makes them feel seen and understood

power_statements.name: Building Together
power_statements.statement: There's something incredibly powerful about finding someone who doesn't just want to take from life, but actually wants to build something real—something that matters not just to you, but that leaves the world a little better than you found it.
power_statements.why_it_works: Speaks to their desire for purpose and impact, frames relationship as collaborative creation, aligns with their values of making a difference, creates shared vision of meaningful connection

DS.name: Intellectual Explorer
DS.neurochemical_profile: Higher phasic dopamine, lower tonic serotonin
core_characteristics: Driven to achieve mastery and recognition
Can be scattered, struggles with completion
what_they_crave: Intellectual stimulation and novel experiences
Someone who can match their curiosity
Sophisticated, worldly conversation
Recognition of their expertise and intelligence
Adventure and exploration with a partner
what_repels_them: Partners who can't keep up mentally
gravitor_themes: Sophistication & Refinement - Values culture and quality
conversation_topics: Art, music, literature, and cultural events

power_statements.name: Intellectual Connection
power_statements.statement: You have this way of seeing connections and patterns that most people miss—it's like your mind is always making these fascinating links between things. It's not just intelligence, it's this unique way of understanding the world that makes conversations with you genuinely interesting.
power_statements.why_it_works: Validates their intellectual curiosity, acknowledges their unique perspective, frames their thinking as special, creates genuine appreciation for their mind

power_statements.name: Adventure & Novelty
power_statements.statement: There's something about new experiences—not just travel, but discovering new ideas, new places, new ways of seeing things—that wakes up something in you. Most people are comfortable with the familiar, but you're wired for exploration and discovery.
power_statements.why_it_works: Speaks to their need for novelty, validates their adventurous nature, positions you as someone who understands their drive, creates shared excitement for exploration

power_statements.name: Mastery Recognition
power_statements.statement: I can tell you're someone who doesn't just do things—you actually master them. There's this precision and dedication in how you approach what you care about that most people never achieve. That level of excellence is rare and it shows.
power_statements.why_it_works: Acknowledges their drive for mastery, validates their high standards, recognizes their dedication and skill, creates admiration for their competence

DD.name: Alpha Conqueror
core_characteristics: Focused on material success and power
what_they_crave: A partner who matches their intensity and drive
Direct, efficient communication
Someone who isn't intimidated by their power
Mutual respect between equals
Achievement and success as a team
what_repels_them: Wasting time with games or drama
Partners who are threatened by their success
gravitor_themes: Control & Autonomy - Wants to be in charge

power_statements.name: Power Recognition
power_statements.statement: You have this presence—this energy that people can feel before you even say anything. It's not just confidence, it's this knowing that you can handle whatever comes at you. That kind of power is rare and it makes people sit up and pay attention.
power_statements.why_it_works: Validates their authority and presence, acknowledges their strength, frames their power as attractive and magnetic, creates respect for their capability

power_statements.name: Achievement Alignment
power_statements.statement: I can see you're someone who doesn't just dream about things—you make them happen. There's this drive in you that most people don't have, this relentless focus on actually achieving what you set out to do. That's impressive.
power_statements.why_it_works: Recognizes their achievement orientation, validates their drive and determination, creates admiration for their results, positions you as someone who respects their power

power_statements.name: Directness Appreciation
power_statements.statement: I appreciate people who are direct—you know exactly what you want and you don't play games about it. Most people waste so much time with hints and subtleties, but you're focused on what actually matters: getting results.
power_statements.why_it_works: Validates their communication style, appreciates their efficiency, aligns with their direct nature, positions you as someone who values their time and clarity
